segments.text: Have you got the medicine yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I've been given so much , that I simply don't know what to do with it all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , these are for internal use.You take a packet each time.Four times a day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They're painkillers.You take one tablet when you feel a pain , but not more than once within four hours .
segments.speaker: S1
